attributes.action: Call for Iain Duncan Smith to live on £53 a week for 3 months
attributes.additional_details: We the people of the United Kingdom call on Iain Duncan Smith to prove his claim to be able to live on just £53 a week with absolutely no other income. He expects the people of the United Kingdom to survive on this and pay all our bills from it too, We ask he does the same to back up his claim
